verses.verse: And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> rose early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>; and they removed <WH5265> <WH8799> from Shittim <WH7851>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> to Yarden <WH3383>, he and all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and lodged <WH3885> <WH8799> there before they passed over <WH5674> <WH8799>.
And it came to pass after <WH7097> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>, that the officers <WH7860> <WH8802> went <WH5674> <WH8799> through <WH7130> the host <WH4264>;

And they commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, When ye see <WH7200> <WH8800> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, and the Kohanim <WH3548> the L'vi'im <WH3881> bearing <WH5375> <WH8802> it, then ye shall remove <WH5265> <WH8799> from your place <WH4725>, and go <WH1980> <WH8804> after <WH310> it.

Yet there shall be a space <WH7350> between you and it, about two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520> by measure <WH4060>: come not near <WH7126> <WH8799> unto it, that ye may know <WH3045> <WH8799> the way <WH1870> by which ye must go <WH3212> <WH8799>: for ye have not passed <WH5674> <WH8804> this way <WH1870> heretofore <WH8543> <WH8032>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Sanctify <WH6942> <WH8690> yourselves: for to morrow <WH4279> the YY <WH3068> will do <WH6213> <WH8799> wonders <WH6381> <WH8737> among <WH7130> you.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto the Kohanim <WH3548>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Take up <WH5375> <WH8798> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285>, and pass over <WH5674> <WH8798> before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>. And they took up <WH5375> <WH8799> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, This day <WH3117> will I begin <WH2490> <WH8686> to magnify <WH1431> <WH8763> thee in the sight <WH5869> of all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that they may know <WH3045> <WH8799> that, as I was with Mosheh <WH4872>, so I will be with thee.

And thou shalt command <WH6680> <WH8762> the Kohanim <WH3548> that bear <WH5375> <WH8802> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, When ye are come <WH935> <WH8800> to the brink <WH7097> of the water <WH4325> of Yarden <WH3383>, ye shall stand still <WH5975> <WH8799> in Yarden <WH3383>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Come hither <WH5066> <WH8798>, and hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the words <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Hereby ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8799> that the living <WH2416> 'Elohim <WH410> is among <WH7130> you, and that he will without fail <WH3423> <WH8687> drive out <WH3423> <WH8686> from before <WH6440> you the Kanahanites <WH3669>, and the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Hivites <WH2340>, and the Perizzites <WH6522>, and the Girgashites <WH1622>, and the Amorites <WH567>, and the Y'vusis <WH2983>.
Behold, the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH113> of all the earth <WH776> passeht over <WH5674> <WH8802> before <WH6440> you into Yarden <WH3383>.
Now therefore take <WH3947> <WH8798> you twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men <WH376> out of the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, out of every <WH259> tribe <WH7626> a man <WH376>.

And it shall come to pass, as soon as the soles <WH3709> of the feet <WH7272> of the Kohanim <WH3548> that bear <WH5375> <WH8802> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>, the YY <WH113> of all the earth <WH776>, shall rest <WH5117> <WH8800> in the waters <WH4325> of Yarden <WH3383>, that the waters <WH4325> of Yarden <WH3383> shall be cut off <WH3772> <WH8735> from the waters <WH4325> that come down <WH3381> <WH8802> from above <WH4605>; and they shall stand <WH5975> <WH8799> upon an <WH259> heap <WH5067>.

And it came to pass, when the people <WH5971> removed <WH5265> <WH8800> from their tents <WH168>, to pass over <WH5674> <WH8800> Yarden <WH3383>, and the Kohanim <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> <WH8802> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>;

And as they that bare <WH5375> <WH8802> the ark <WH727> were come <WH935> <WH8800> unto Yarden <WH3383>, and the feet <WH7272> of the Kohanim <WH3548> that bare <WH5375> <WH8802> the ark <WH727> were dipped <WH2881> <WH8738> in the brim <WH7097> of the water <WH4325>, (for Yarden <WH3383> overfloweth <WH4390> <WH8804> all his banks <WH1415> all the time <WH3117> of harvest <WH7105>,)

That the waters <WH4325> which came down <WH3381> <WH8802> from above <WH4605> stood <WH5975> <WH8799> and rose up <WH6965> <WH8804> upon an <WH259> heap <WH5067> very <WH3966> far <WH7368> <WH8687> from the city <WH5892> Adam <WH121>, that is beside <WH6654> Zaretan <WH6891>: and those that came down <WH3381> <WH8802> toward the sea <WH3220> of the plain <WH6160>, even the salt <WH4417> sea <WH3220>, failed <WH8552> <WH8804>, and were cut off <WH3772> <WH8738>: and the people <WH5971> passed over <WH5674> <WH8804> right against Yericho <WH3405>.

And the Kohanim <WH3548> that bare <WH5375> <WH8802> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> stood <WH5975> <WH8799> firm <WH3559> <WH8687> on dry ground <WH2724> in the midst <WH8432> of Yarden <WH3383>, and all the Yisra'ELites <WH3478> passed over <WH5674> <WH8802> on dry ground <WH2724>, until all the people <WH1471> were passed <WH5674> clean <WH8552> <WH8804> over <WH5674> <WH8800> Yarden <WH3383>.
